nodes.text: Some time during 1 ABY, Parugga traveled to a city on Tatooine with a group of fellow smugglers. Not long after, a bounty hunter named Tearfin located Parugga and his associates, suspecting him of being a thief who stole some valuable equipment.

Tearfin interrogated Parugga, but could not determine whether he was innocent or guilty. A spacer eventually came along to help Tearfin. After interrogating all the smugglers, the spacer cleared Parugga of any suspicions, concluding that Rh'klin was in fact the thief.

Parugga is a Non-Player Characters (NPC's) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He periodically spawns in random cities across Tatooine, along with Tearfin and the five other smugglers. Players taking part in the "Hero of Tatooine" quest-line must interrogate Parugga and the other smugglers, to determine which one is Tearfin's mark.
Due to the nature of the game, Parugga's appearance fluctuates, but he is always a male.
